title: The Quinkins
creator_credit: Paul R. Gagne and Weston Woods Studios
brief_description: A group of First Nations storytellers combined their talents to create the pictures and sound for this traditional tale of conflict between the Imnims and the Timaras in Dreamtime. Uses the illustrations from the book of the same name by Dick Roughsey and Percy Trezise.
